Text:
Alex Jones Jewish Connections

1.) He has a Jewish wife named Kelly Rebeca Nichols.

2.) He has three(3) Jewish children with his wife Kelly Rebecca Nichols.

3.) He and his wife and children are all eligible for Israeli citizenship under Israels Law of Return.

4.) He has at least nineteen(19) Jewish sponsors and advertizers that financially support his radio show and websites.

5.) He has a Jewish lawyer named Elizabeth M. Schurig who is also the lawyer for Holly Lev Bronfman, Edgar Bronfmans sister, meaning that there are only two degrees of separation between Alex Jones and the Bronfman family. The Bronfman family is one of the most powerful Jewish Zionist families in the world.

6.) His flagship radio station, KLBJ AM, in Austin, Texas, is owned by Emmis Communications, a media conglomerate based in Indianapolis, Indiana. The founder, president, CEO, and chairman of Emmis Communications is a dual Israeli citizen Zionist Jew named Jeffrey H. Smulyan.

7.) His radio show is broadcast on Sirius XM satellite radio. The chairman of Sirius XM Radio is a Jew named Eddy W. Hartenstein. The CEO of Sirius XM Radio is a Jew named Mel Karmazin. The President and Chief Content Officer of Sirius XM Radio is a Jew named Scott Greenstein. Of the six(6) executive officers of Sirius XM Radio, five(5) are Jews.

8.) Alex Jones' best friend Joe Rogan is Jewish

9.) Alex says he supports the Jewish state of Israel and the United Nations is conspiring against Jews
